jcr:root.jcr:description: I absolutely love the look of these shoes, but I don’t know if they are any good or not.
jcr:root.jcr:title: Has anyone tried the Mombassa Runners?
jcr:root.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/536.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/19.0.1084.56 Safari/536.5

acdv-i_love_my_mombassar.jcr:description: I love my Mombassa Runners! In addition to them being really cute (I get complements for them all the time) I also was able to relieve some knee pain by running with these shoes. I can’t say enough about them.
acdv-i_love_my_mombassar.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/536.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/19.0.1084.56 Safari/536.5

imga-you_girls_dontknow.jcr:description: You girls don’t know what you’re talking about. The Jola Summer is where it’s at!
imga-you_girls_dontknow.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/536.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/19.0.1084.56 Safari/536.5

mai7-so_was_i_webetter.jcr:description: So was I! We better not cross paths when we’re running, unless you want to see your twin! Maybe I’ll get the Devi shirt instead…it looks really comfortable.
mai7-so_was_i_webetter.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/536.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/19.0.1084.56 Safari/536.5

soxw-thanks_alisonthat.jcr:description: Thanks Alison! That’s really great to know. I was thinking about getting the shoes with the Bora Bora tank to match.
soxw-thanks_alisonthat.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/536.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/19.0.1084.56 Safari/536.5
